TopicTitle: Help with Getting Started with Kopernicus

Articles.Content: I would like to make a planet pack with kopernicus, but I don't know where to start. Should I learn by just using the "Kopernicus Examples" or find a guide. I understand the basics, but not much else like PQS mods.
Learn how the PQSMods work properly first, learn what does what. I'm currently in the process of overhauling the kopernicus examples, so keep an eye out
